mapper.sql: id, advertId, channelId, person_in_charge, isAccept, price, remark,add_name,add_time
mapper.select: select adv.id as id,adv.advertId as advertId,cha.channel_name as channelName, adv.person_in_charge as personInCharge,adv.isAccept as isAccept,adv.price as price, adv.remark as remark,adv.add_name as addName,adv.add_time as addTime from tb_advert_channel_enquiry as adv inner join tb_channel as cha on adv.channelId=cha.id where adv.advertId = #{advertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_advert_channel_enquiry
advertId, channelId, person_in_charge, isAccept, price, remark, add_name,add_time,
#{advertid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{personInCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isaccept,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update tb_advert_channel_enquiry
advertId = #{advertid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channelId = #{channelid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
person_in_charge = #{personInCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isAccept = #{isaccept,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_name= #{addName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_advert_channel_enquiry set advertId = #{advertid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channelId = #{channelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, person_in_charge = #{personInCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isAccept = #{isaccept,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_name= #{addName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
